<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Arcane Fists](/Feats.aspx?ID=3033) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 42 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your physical training encompasses unarmed combat forms. The damage die for your [fist](/Weapons.aspx?ID=1) changes to 1d6 instead of 1d4. You don't take the normal –2 circumstance penalty when making a lethal attack with your fist or any other [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attacks. Your unarmed attacks gain the [arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11) trait, making them [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103). At 5th level, you also gain the [critical specialization effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=235) of unarmed attacks in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) group and weapons in the brawling group.
name: Arcane Fists
